name: LMN: Liebt Mich Nicht
description:
Liebt Mich Nicht: A Romantic Tragedy

LMN is a free-to-play Metroidvania-style platformer with an aesthetic pixel art style and queer Romantic story elements.

Meet Gottfried, a young man caught up in his lover's shady dealings with the occult.  Gottfried must attempt to overcome a tirade of demons and restore his mutilated world before it crumbles away into nothing, along with the truth of his lover's betrayal.
